lead_paragraph: KATZ--Peggy Roselle, born May 29, 1945 on Long Island, NY to Ellen Rowsell and George A. Goldstein, died December 1, 2015 in Atlanta, GA. She is survived by her brother Andy Goldstein, her children Andrew and Jon Katz, and her grandchildren Sebastian, Nicholas, and Audrey. Her husband, Robert "Bob" Katz, passed in 2013. A true friend, beloved colleague, and adored mom, she will forever remain in our hearts. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KATZ, PEGGY ROSELLE
